name: Coffee Road
description:
Coffee Road is a game about a Game Jam Cup. With a quest to transmit energy to your jammer through coffee, while making sure that yours and other jammers don’t find out you’re a sentient coffee cup.
Made at Melbourne Global Game Jam 2018 in 48 hours. 

Credits: 

Devs: Tyson Butler-Boschma, Yasin Karatas, Vasilious Moutafis, Timothy Patullock. 

Audio: Corey Taylor, Matt Schnekel, David Weaver
